actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to reopen the base membership roll of the Pascua Yaqui Indian Tribe of Arizona.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to reopen for two years the base membership roll of the Pascua Yaqui Indian Tribe of Arizona and to provide notice of such action. Sets forth eligibility requirements for membership.

titles.title: A bill to reopen the base membership roll of the Pascua Yaqui Indian Tribe of Arizona.
